title: Movie Rating App
description: A comprehensive movie rating and review platform where users can browse movies, rate them, and share reviews. Features user authentication and safe database storage.

title: Ganesh Hospital
description: A modern hospital management frontend designed for patients and administrators. Includes appointment booking interfaces and service showcases.

title: Playshop
description: Fighting games, a genre known for intense one-on-one or team-based combat. Explore a rich history of obscure mechanics and influential figures.

title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: A fantastic way to learn and expand one's understanding of the world. Offers a fun and engaging way to absorb information across various subjects.

title: Employee Management System
description: A collection of web experiments and mini-applications showcasing various frontend development techniques and interactive elements.
